member.name: P:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.enemyTurretPairs
member.summary: This is for all enemy turret pairs.

member.name: P:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.forceSpawns
member.summary: If enabled, will force any spawned Coil-Heads to become Toil-Heads. This will get reset automatically when the day ends.

member.name: P:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.forceMaxSpawnCount
member.summary: If set to any value above -1, will temporarily override the Toil-Head max spawn count. This will get reset automatically when the day ends.

member.name: M:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.SetToilHeadOnServer(EnemyAI)
member.summary: This must only be called on the Host/Server. Only accepts an EnemyAI instance where the EnemyType.enemyName is "Spring".

member.name: P:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.forceMantiToilSpawns
member.summary: If enabled, will force any spawned Manticoils to become Manti-Toils. This will get reset automatically when the day ends.

member.name: P:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.forceMantiToilMaxSpawnCount
member.summary: If set to any value above -1, will temporarily override the Manti-Toil max spawn count. This will get reset automatically when the day ends.

member.name: M:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.SetMantiToilOnServer(EnemyAI)
member.summary: This must only be called on the Host/Server. Only accepts an EnemyAI instance where the EnemyType.enemyName is "Manticoil".
